intro.name: Hello, my name is
intro.text:
I have a digital engineering degree from ESAIP Angers. I like to build web-related things. Recently I contributed to the development of
Carool
's app and its internal tools.

about.title: About me
about.text_1: Hello! My name is Alexis and I love creating web-related things. I started programming in high school with Python, HTML, or Java courses, but my interest in web development started in 2021 with an introductory Javascript course from an entertaining teacher who stimulated my passion for web development.
about.text_2:
I recently finished my end-of-studies internship at
Ippon Technologies
. My mission at
Carool
 led me to improve user experience and create exciting new features.
about.technologies: Here are some technologies I have recently worked with:

2.title: Fullstack developer intern
2.bullet_points: 6 month internship|Integration of analytics API|Creation of end-to-end tests|Creation of API endpoints|Continuous improvement of the application

3.title: Web developer intern
3.bullet_points: 2 month internship|Integrated real time updates with Websockets|Various performance optimizations and bug fixes|Implemented a client chat feature with it's overview dashboard|Vue, Laravel

4.title: Web developer
4.bullet_points: Service paid by the company to the school to fund parts of a student's curriculum|The company was opening it's new shop and needed a planning tool for the workshop to keep track of the work to be done and assigning it to different people|Vue, Laravel

0.title: US Media Archiver
0.text: Archiver and comparator of CNN and FOX news headlines, screenshots taken every 6 hours with a cloud function using Puppeteer

1.title: PokéPostie
1.text: Website concept for a French company to serve as an intermediary for grading Pokemon cards in the US with payments powered by Stripe

2.title: Messaging app
2.text: Meta-Messenger like type application with real-time updates

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open.

credits: Design credits goes to Brittany Chiang
